loan.name: Abdreim
loan.description:
Abdreim, a 60-year-old farmer, is a remarkable individual dedicated to agricultural excellence. With a 13-hectare plot of fertile land, he specializes in cultivating pumpkins and corn, yielding up to 100 tons of produce per season. Over the years, he has become a significant supplier of agricultural crops, serving numerous communities in the region.

From inheriting a small plot at the age of 25 to building a thriving farm, Abdreim's journey reflects hard work and commitment to his craft.

Recently, he decided to invest in natural fertilizer and minerals to enrich his soil's productivity while maintaining sustainability, ensuring a bountiful and eco-friendly harvest in the coming year. Abdreim envisions continuous growth and development in his farming business. His goal is to provide quality produce to the community while securing a prosperous future for his family and his farm.
loan.whySpecial: The loan extends access to financial services for those living in rural areas.
